# 35th Golden Bell Awards

The 35th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第35屆金鐘獎) was held on October 6, 2000 at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by Formosa Television.
